vclaim: The World Health Organization's director-general said COVID-19 vaccines are "being used to kill children."
title: No, WHO’s Director-General Didn’t Say COVID Vaccines Are ‘Being Used To Kill Children’
subtitle: A brief clip of a comment made by World Health Organization Director-General Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus misrepresented what he said.
author: Bethania Palma
